This cabernet offers an excellent price point considering its abundant fruitiness and depth of flavor. The cost is surprisingly reasonable given how lush and juicy it tastes. A steal for such richness and fruit-forward character. It's dry, tannic and full-bodied, with blackberry, black currant, dark chocolate and oak flavors made for drinking now.
